availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph T. Lokey (Brown County, Ohio, harness maker )

body.p: Brown County, Ohio, harness maker. Ohio native. Harness maker in Brown County, Ohio in 1863. Served in the 10th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry.

ab.bibl: Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Brown County, OH, August 1863, p. 173, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
